title: Task 1: Turning on the machine and retracting the filament.

steps.text: 1. Turn ON the 3D Printer at the backside of the by clicking on the button on the backside of the printer.
2. Go back to the front of the 3D Printer and click on the touch screen.
3. Click on the slider icon on the left side of the screen to open the tune menu.
4. Select the 'Extrude/Retract' tab.
5. Click the Retract option to retract any leftover filament from the nozzle.
6. Click the retract option again to remove the filament from the print bed.
7. Return back to the 3D printer by clicking the X button on the top right.
8. Turn ON the Dry Box by clicking on the switch at the backside of the machine.
9. Click on the filament spool to put the filament in the Dry Box
10. Click on the filament hole at the back of the lid to put the filament string through the hole.
11. Click the button on the Dry Box to change the Dry Box settings.
12. To select the heat, click the button once.
13. Click the button once again to select the time.
14. Confirm the changes by clicking the button one final time.
15. To close the settings, click the closest X button
16. Take of the top panel of the 3D printer by clicking on the top lid of the 3D printer.
17. Unlock the nozzle lever by clicking on the lever.
18. Feed the filament by clicking on the tube that is attached to the filament spool
19. When the filament is completely through the tube, click the lever again to lock it.
20. Put the top panel back on the 3D Printer by clicking on the X on the top right.
21. Go back to the touchscreen.
22. Select the slider icon to go to the tune menu again.
23. Select the 'Extrude/Retract' tab once again.
24. Click the Extrude button to extrude the filament from the nozzle.
25. Click the Extrude button once again to remove the filament from the print bed.
26. Click the X to go back to the 3D printer.
27. Plug your USB drive into the 3D printer by clicking on the USB port.
28. Go to the touchscreen and select the Files icon to open the Files menu.
29. Select the USB drive tab.
30. Click on item 1 to print that file.
31. Tick the calibration box to automate the calibration.
32. Click the print button to print your file.
33. Remove the print from the print bed by clicking on the print.
34. Place the print bed back into the 3D printer by clicking on the X on the top right.

title: Task 8: Retracting the filament once again

steps.text: 37. Go back to the touchscreen.
38. Select the slider icon to open the tuning menu.
39. Select the 'Extrude/Retract' tab.
40. Click the Retract option to retract the leftover filament from the nozzle.
41. Click the Retract option again to remove the filament from the print bed.
42. Return back to the 3D printer by clicking the X button on the top right.
43. Turn OFF the 3D printer by clicking on the switch at the backside of the machine.
44. Turn OFF the Dry Box by clicking on the switch at the backside of the machine.
